name: Nizkif
content:
Nizkif was a male Advozse who lived on Coruscant during the Cold War. He frequented the Dealer's Den cantina in the Old Galactic Market.
Nizkif appears in the BioWare MMORPG Star Wars: The Old Republic as part of the mission "Partial Eclipse". If the player chooses the dark side option and agrees to sell Black Sun's list of informants and gang leaders, Agent Folaris sends the player to sell it to Nizkif.
